passengerDistribution.name: Total customers during the time period
passengerDistribution.value: The total number of effective customers who enter the store or group during a selected time period.

passengerDistribution.name: Average Daily Customer Flow/Visit
passengerDistribution.value: During a selected time period (default time period is 7 days), the average number of daily entering customers.

passengerDistribution.name: Average daily new customers
passengerDistribution.value: The average number of daily new customers who enter the store or group during a selected time period.

passengerDistribution.name: Average daily return customers
passengerDistribution.value: The average number of daily return customers who enter the store or group during a selected time period

passengerExpanding.name: 种子客群
passengerExpanding.value: 用于进行客群特征机器学习、lookalike放大的样本客群数据。

passengerOverview_1.name: Customer Flow Today
passengerOverview_1.value: The number of effective customers who enter the store or group on that day; repeat visits are not counted.

passengerOverview_1.name: Customer Flow in Last 7 Days
passengerOverview_1.value: The number of effective customers who entered the store or group during the last 7 days (excluding the current day); repeat visits within a day are not counted.

passengerOverview_1.name: Customer flow in last 30 days
passengerOverview_1.value: The number of effective customers who entered the store or group during the last 30 days (excluding the current day); repeat visits within a day are not counted.

passengerOverview_1.name: Total Customers
passengerOverview_1.value: The total number of effective customers who entered the store or group from the launch date to current date; repeat visits within a day are not counted.

passengerOverview_2.name: Customer Flow Today
passengerOverview_2.value: The number of effective customers who enter the store or group on that day; repeat visits are not counted.

passengerOverview_2.name: Customer Flow in Last 7 Days
passengerOverview_2.value: The number of effective customers who entered the store or group during the last 7 days (excluding the current day); repeat visits within a day are not counted。

passengerOverview_2.name: Customer flow in last 30 days
passengerOverview_2.value: The number of effective customers who entered the store or group during the last 30 days (excluding the current day); repeat visits within a day are not counted.

passengerOverview_2.name: New Customers in Last 30 Days
passengerOverview_2.value: The number of effective new customers who entered the store or group during the last 30 days (excluding the current day); repeat visits within a day are not counted.

passengerOverview_2.name: Average Length of Stay/Visit in Last 30 Days
passengerOverview_2.value: The average time of effective customers who entered and stayed in the store or group during the last 30 days (excluding the current day).

passengerOverview_2.name: Effective customer
passengerOverview_2.value: The number of customers who enter the store or group on that day; repeat visits are not counted.

passengerOverview_2.name: Staying customer
passengerOverview_2.value: The number of effective customers who enter and stay in the store or group and reach the effective staying customer threshold in single visit on that day, repeat visits within a day are not counted

passengerOverview_2.name: New customer
passengerOverview_2.value: Effective customers who enter the store or group for the first time.

passengerOverview_2.name: Return customer
passengerOverview_2.value: Effective customers who entered the store or group before.

passengerOverview_2.name: Average daily customer flow
passengerOverview_2.value: The average number of daily effective customers who enter the store or group during a selected time period.。

passengerOverview_3.name: Effective customer
passengerOverview_3.value: The number of customers who enter the store or group on that day; repeat visits are not counted.

passengerOverview_3.name: New customer
passengerOverview_3.value: Effective customers who enter the store or group for the first time.

passengerOverview_3.name: Return customer
passengerOverview_3.value: Effective customers who entered the store or group before.

passengerOverview_3.name: Staying customer
passengerOverview_3.value: The number of effective customers who enter and stay in the store or group and reach the effective staying customer threshold in single visit, repeat visits within a day are not counted

passengerOverview_3.name: Stay Rate
passengerOverview_3.value: The ratio of staying customers who enter the store or group to effective customers who enter the store or group.

passengerOverview_3.name: Average Length of Stay/Visit
passengerOverview_3.value: The average time of effective customers who enter and stay in the store or group.

passengerOverview_4.name: Customer Density
passengerOverview_4.value: The ratio of average number of daily effective customers in a store to the size of the store during a selected time period.

passengerOverview_4.name: Stay Customer Density
passengerOverview_4.value: During a selected time period, the ratio of average number of daily staying customer in a store to the size of the store.

passengerPeople.name: App preference
passengerPeople.value: The proportion of selected customers who have preference for certain apps.

passengerPeople.name: App Preference Level
passengerPeople.value: The degree by which the selected customers who show an increased preference for certain apps compared with people in the city where the store or group is located.

passengerTrend_1.name: Total customers during the time period
passengerTrend_1.value: The total number of effective customers who enter the store or group during a selected time period.

passengerTrend_1.name: New customer ratio
passengerTrend_1.value: He ratio of new customers to the total number of effective customers who enter the store or group during a selected time period.

passengerTrend_1.name: Peak hour
passengerTrend_1.value: During a selected time period, a full hour during the day with the highest total number of effective customers who enter the store or group.

passengerTrend_1.name: Customer Flow% in peak hours
passengerTrend_1.value: The ratio of peak hour effective customers to daily effective customers during a selected time period.

passengerTrend_1.name: Visiting hour ratio
passengerTrend_1.value: The ratio of effective customers who enter the store or group in each hour to the total number of daily effective customers during a selected time period.

passengerTrend_2.name: Effective customer
passengerTrend_2.value: The number of customers who enter the store or group on that day; repeat visits are not counted.

passengerTrend_2.name: Staying customer
passengerTrend_2.value: The number of effective customers who enter and stay in the store or group and reach the effective staying customer threshold in single visit, repeat visits within a day are not counted

passengerTrend_2.name: Stay Rate
passengerTrend_2.value: The ratio of staying customers who enter the store or group to effective customers who enter the store or group.

passengerTrend_2.name: New customer
passengerTrend_2.value: Effective customers who enter the store or group for the first time.

passengerTrend_2.name: Return customer
passengerTrend_2.value: Effective customers who entered the store or group before.

passengerTrend_2.name: Average Daily Customer Flow
passengerTrend_2.value: The average number of daily effective customers who enter the store or group during a selected time period.

visitDepth_1.name: Average daily customer flow
visitDepth_1.value: The average number of daily effective customers who enter the store or group during a selected time period.

visitDepth_1.name: Average Length of Stay/Visit
visitDepth_1.value: The average time of effective customers who enter and stay in the store or group.

visitDepth_1.name: Average Visit Days/Month
visitDepth_1.value: The average visiting days of effective return customers who enter the store or group within last 30 days during a selected time period.

visitDepth_1.name: Average visit days/month
visitDepth_1.value: The average visiting days of effective customers who enter the store or group within last 30 days during a selected time period.

visitDepth_1.name: Average number of store visited
visitDepth_1.value: During a selected time period, the average number of stores that the customer visited each time (s)he comes to the shopping mall (excluding current day).

visitDepth_1.name: Average Length of Stay
visitDepth_1.value: During a selected time period, the average time of staying customers who enter the store (excluding current day).
